snippet: As the justices on the Supreme Court consider two major cases on same-sex marriage, students of the court say factors other than just legal issues may play a role.
abstract: Students of Supreme Court say factors other than legal issues may play a role as court considers two major cases on same-sex marriage; openly gay law clerks are now common in chambers of both liberal and conservative justices.
lead_paragraph: As the justices on the Supreme Court consider two major cases on same-sex marriage, students of the court say factors other than just legal issues may play a role.

headline.main: Exhibit A for a Major Shift: Justices’ Gay Clerks
headline.print_headline: Exhibit A for a Major Shift: Justices’ Gay Clerks

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
